website_summaries.verdict: While this bra isn't the best pick for someone who wants dramatic cleavage, it's worth considering for those who dislike underwires.
pros: Uses structured panels in the cups instead of an underwire to provide a natural-looking lift
Fit is comfortable and true-to-size for most women
Choice of several colors and patterns
cons: Not as supportive as a push-up bras with an underwire
There's only one way to wear the straps

customer_reviews.title: Since the whole reason I'm seeking a good cotton bra is for my skin
customer_reviews.text: The OUTSIDE is cotton; the cup lining is clearly the same polyester/nylon/etc as my other Warner's bra. Since the whole reason I'm seeking a good cotton bra is for my skin, this won't work. Honestly, what's the point of a cotton exterior if the part up against the skin is still synthetic??
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Cup linings are not cotton
customer_reviews.text: This bra was described as 90% cotton (looked like the straps were elastic), but when it arrived the cups were lined with a synthetic fabric. What a waste of my time.
customer_reviews.author: Customer from CT

customer_reviews.title: Too many to choose from
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Warner bras for about ten years and I haven't found any brand I like better. One thing I find frustrating is that Warner always seems to be changing one component or another about their basic model that makes it impossible to buy the same item year in and year out. I have four different kinds of "Invisible Bliss Wirefree" something or others. So I have my favorites, and those I like a bit less. But all in all this bra is 4/5. It gives the appearance (through a tee shirt) that my boobs sit much higher than they would naturally. But it fits well and it's comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ireadreviews

customer_reviews.title: Put uncomfortably stiff seams on the side to try to add support.
customer_reviews.text: The seam on the side is very stiff- rubbed my skin raw there in just a couple hours. I have no excess chub up top so nothing was bulging over or up against that spot.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy nylon knot on thread
customer_reviews.text: The itchiest bra I've ever had; cannot wear it due to a hard - I think it is a nylon thread that is too long or a knot, scratches and itches me under the hooks. Might be unique to mine; I have not yet explored cutting it, as I'm afraid it will fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Mammoot

customer_reviews.title: A+ Wire hold w/o the wire
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable, love the cotton!!! Holds like wire but has nothing to poke.
customer_reviews.author: StyleSnob

customer_reviews.title: Overall good bra
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this bra. True to size, even without strap adjusters. I guess I didn’t read that there weren’t strap adjusters, so I was pretty surprised. But it works! It does bunch up a little on the sides, which is annoying and requires adjusting. Also there’s a sort of sharp edge somewhere on the back of the bra that bothers me every once in a while. I’m hoping either I get used to it or it wears down a bit with wearing and washing. There are much more positives than negatives though - overall comfy bra, looks good, fits right, does it’s job :)
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. I’m usually a 36C in other bras
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Amazing. I’m usually a 36C in other bras, but for some reason I find that the 36C in Warner’s bras to be too large for me. In light of that, I decided to go with the 34C instead. I’m so glad I did. This is, hands down, the most comfortable wireless bra I’ve ever had. I want one in every color. For reference, I’m 125lb, usually a 36C, I ordered the 34C. Hopefully that is helpful. Btw the non-adjustable straps are a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely-ness

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable t-shirt Bra!!
customer_reviews.text: Long search is over for comfortable Bra. Fits great! I have 5 total now! No adjusting straps, no wires, no extra material under arm. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR ME!
customer_reviews.text: I don't need a lot of support by any means but I do want comfort and a flat line under a T Shirt. I bought 3 of these in different colors because they fit me perfectly. I'm 5'4" 122 lbs and the fact that the straps don't adjust isn't an issue for me. There isn't anything I don't like about these. They look nice enough for the average athletic gal that doesn't need all that fringe and lace but again, looking clean under a T or a blouse is a huge deal when half the bras out there have that gap at the top for us smaller gals. Try one and then get more!
customer_reviews.author: A. Rey

customer_reviews.title: Wireless
customer_reviews.text: Good wireless bra. Inside has little pads to give the girls a small lift. This bra does not have adjustable straps. I'm 5'8" and the straps are fine for me, but not sure how this can be one size fits all. I used the Calvin Klein method of fitting (see pic) over the traditional.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Too large and bulky
customer_reviews.text: Extra padding inside the bottom of the cups is quite unnecessary. Also, this one runs quite large, especially in the cups. I am a person with broad chest, but smaller cup size, a B. What I need is a bra which is longer, with taller straps, but not big cups. This one has cups that could fit a person with size D.
customer_reviews.author: Panpra

customer_reviews.title: Before you buy consider this review!!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t buy these ever again mainly because the straps are not adjustable!! The cup and fit of the bra is perfect except for the OVERLOOKED detail that you can’t adjust the straps?? I’m 115 lb and 5’3” and they just barely BARELY don’t fit. If I could adjust the strap a few centimeters, we’d be at a 5 star review. Shame and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable cotton bra. That makes it more breathable in the hot summer weather. It also has a slimmer cut which helps too. The straps are not adjustable that is really better than those sliding things on other bras and all this is why I bought a second one after I wore it for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: MEH of NJ

customer_reviews.title: Back construction
customer_reviews.text: The support was there even without the wires but it's still a bra and chaffs after a bit at closure. Big plus for me is the construction of the back that keep straps on my narrow shoulders. Comfort and bra is an oxymoron but it's the closest yet! I will order again with a one step up in size to reduce chaffing..
customer_reviews.author: MBO

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable bra for me. Overall the back part lifts up where the straps are and I don't like non adjustable straps.
customer_reviews.author: Jímena

customer_reviews.title: Finally a nude cotton bra that fits!
customer_reviews.text: When Victoria's Secret stopped making their "true" cotton bra line, I had to look and look and look, until I eventually found this one, which fits my odd size perfectly and washes up great! (I am unable to wear anything but cotton against my skin.) Thank you Warner for keeping a cotton bra, as well as a bra in the nude color that goes with everything :)
customer_reviews.author: CarolMom57

customer_reviews.title: Previous version without lift was more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked a previous version of this bra, without lift. It was very comfortable. I like a material of this bra, but now they added small pads for lift, which makes it, for me, much less comfortable. I though first, that I would be able to take them out, as in some other bras, but it is completely impossible, as these pads are molded together with cup. Previous version was also sewn with better craftsmanship. Be aware, that bra has awful smell, it takes a while to get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tech

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable bra. There is no underwire so it doesn’t dig into you, but still supports you like there was. Also it’s not to thin so if you get cold it doesn’t show. I am ordering another one in a different color because I love this bra so much!! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: msed

customer_reviews.title: Not Natural looking
customer_reviews.text: Like others have mentioned, the cups are so unnatural looking. They stick out like something out of the 50's. Not like a bigger bust, just pointy and in the wrong position. I also agree with another reviewer who asked why Warner's has to keep changing things. If you ever find a bra you like, better order a lifetime supply, because the model will most assuredly be discontinued or changed before the bra wears out. I ordered this bra because the under-band is soft cotton. It was comfortable in that regard, if you don't mind the unnatural look.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most comfortable bra I have ever owned. No underwire poking me, it stays in place, no falling bra straps and full coverage but doesn't look like a grandma bra. I like that it's similar to a sports bra, but you don't have to stretch it and try to get it over your head and pulled down and then it squishes your ladies- I like that it has a clasp and actual bra cups.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Tennant

customer_reviews.title: Product details did not actually describe the product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a padded bra. I thought that I was buying a basic cotton bra with no padding. This product runs large and has no adjustable straps. It might have shrunk to fit better, but I did not want to waste the money to check this out. I'm returning all of them, despairing of finding a basic, adjustable cotton bra. Guess I should be shopping in a brick and mortar store where I can see the product.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Fines

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and caused chafing
customer_reviews.text: After the second wearing, I got chafed underneath the breast and in my armpits. For something that has no underwire I did not expect the elastic to cause chafing. It doesn’t provide much support either. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Weibel

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, great stretch, but no adjustable straps
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite bra. Only downside is the straps aren’t adjustable so after awhile I imagine they’ll stretch and I’ll have to buy a new one. Hasn’t happened yet so we’ll see. Other than that, perfect and so comfy!
customer_reviews.author: JustW

customer_reviews.title: This bra is SO comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I stopped wearing underwire for over about 5 years now and I usually wear non-supportive bras, so I didn't know if this would be comfortable for me. It fits perfectly, there isn't too much fabric under your arms and I feel better in this then I did when I wore underwire bras. I bought the nude color and loved it so much I got another one!
customer_reviews.author: SDC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good value
customer_reviews.text: I like these wider shoulder straps, since they seem to stay in place better, and the fact that the "adjustable" part of the strap is in the back. Also the fact that this bra isn't an underwire. I'm still not in love with the bra (I think this is more my issue than the bra's issue! ;-) but it's more comfortable than most and it's a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect everyday bra!
customer_reviews.text: I had never bought a bra on-line because I have so much trouble even finding one in stores that is comfortable and fits correctly. But I took a chance on this one because I really wanted an all cotton bra to wear in sticky weather. This bra is perfect for my small 34A size! The little built in pads in the bottom of the cups fill it out nicely. I have gone back and bought it in 3 more colors. It is not fancy or sexy but it is super comfortable and really great for everyday wear. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: santa cruiser

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made and very comfortable bra. The cup shape is flattering, and it is smooth enough to be worn under light clothing. I was pleasantly surprised, and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I really hate most bras but have to say that this is one of the most comfortable bras I've ever worn. It's not for large breasted girls but this one gives medium to small breasted women a nice little bit of uplift without the discomfort of wires and is super soft and comfortable. The only way it could be improved would be to add strap adjusting to it (that's one thing that's missing from this otherwise great bra). Good price and appears to be really nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: jbsilverspring

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable wireless option.
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on in a store first. They're not quite as supportive as underwire, but I found that they held me up and in shape better than any other wireless bra. They're definitely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly. It feels sturdy - it's not going to get lumpy or lopsided or stretch out. It washes great (I never review before washing and wearing a few times). I prefer to try these on in a store, but the way things are now, I can't. I ordered three different brands, and this is the keeper!
customer_reviews.author: It'll be FUN!

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and very supportive
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra. I was looking for something that was supportive and that was comfortable, I was over wearing wired bras. This bra is super supportive and I can wear it all day without it bothering me. I no longer come home and take off my bra right away. I will be purchasing some more.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance at ordering this item online. I wish I would have stuck with my gut and just went to a store. I am a 38D. I ordered my normal size. The bra runs small. If you do choose to buy this I would definitely size up at least in the band if not the cup size too. The straps are not adjustable at all so it also cuts into my shoulders. This bra is not comfortable at all and I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany grimes

customer_reviews.title: don't bother if you are looking for a cotton bra ...
customer_reviews.text: don't bother if you are looking for a cotton bra. this bra is only cotton on the outside. inside lining is 100% synthetic and not breathable. color is also not as shown either, it's a dark putty not nude
customer_reviews.author: K. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: No wires, but no adjustable straps either!
customer_reviews.text: Either I’ve gained weight or the size is a bit small. I had to buy bra extensions. I love the feel, the support and NO WIRES! The straps are non-adjustable. I'm tall so it would help to have adjustable straps in the future. It turns out, after wearing for several weeks, I'm not really that happy with how they are made.
customer_reviews.author: Miss D

customer_reviews.title: Not my taste
customer_reviews.text: I will be returning this bra. It was a touch too big but I fit bras a little different depending how they are made. This one was super thick, the whole cup and straps and everything. It felt like way too thick and heavy duty feeling for my smallish chest (lol). I am a 32B on average and 5'2" 110lbs. It felt comfortable though!
customer_reviews.author: WMC

customer_reviews.title: Warner bra
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about the bras except the ripples in the cup which show through my tee shirts. (I washed the bras in cold water and air dried them, so was surprised by the ripples in all 3. I haven't been able to work them out. I have other Warner bras with similar cups and don't have that problem.)
customer_reviews.author: petersd

customer_reviews.title: NOT cotton!!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this bra before...it's a decent product, but I was looking for a COTTON bra; this has not cotton whatsoever. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Lightseeker

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is really comfortable. Straps aren’t adjustable which kinda threw me initially but they seem to almost know how they are supposed to fit if that makes sense. They conform to your body and don’t dig in. Very comfy bra.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: No Adjustable Straps
customer_reviews.text: The cups are true to size. The fabric is soft and the bra seems well constructed. The biggest problem is that there isn't adjustable straps. I knew this when I ordered after reading reviews. I have narrow shoulders so I thought it would work okay, but the straps were just too tight.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Very light support, no shoulder strap adjustment
customer_reviews.text: There's no shoulder strap adjustment, and it is made of VERY stretchy cotton so only buy if you prefer very light support. I would only recommend for an A or B cup.
customer_reviews.author: CouleeBear

customer_reviews.title: Soft..comfortable..fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bra. I just bought another one. A little lift and no wires! No gaping..no constant tugging. Soft & comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: This bra is great and I will be ordering more. It fits snug and will order the next size up. The fabric is nice and washes amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong bra received
customer_reviews.text: I "ordered again" the first bra I received was perfect. Thinking that I was getting the same kind I ordered before. I wore it a couple of times and noticed it was starting to get uncomfortable. I looked and saw that it was a totally different bra. Unfortunately I have already worn it so I can't return it. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Little Peach

customer_reviews.title: Straps not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: This was smaller around the chest than expected and still tight even when using a bra extender. Cup size as expected. The shoulder straps are not adjustable. I will not order this again. Only kept it because I threw it in the wash before trying on.
customer_reviews.author: NurseSmartyPants

customer_reviews.title: stretchy fit bra.
customer_reviews.text: Very stretchy fit, there is no adjustment on shoulder straps. Cup size on this brand is a little loose for me, I could probably go down a cup size for a better fit. My regular size is 40C. More of the coverage is on the sides. Cotton blend, smooth and soft.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Cup size a little large, band size fine
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in my normal bra size, NOT according to size chart. I am a 36C and found the band was fine, size wise, but the cups had a small gap. However, the gap on me was not large enough to size down. Straps are NOT adjustable but that worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: EMK

customer_reviews.title: band is too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the same size as other Warner bras I already own but the band on this one was much too small. The two ends had a gap of at least 3 inches. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Corolla Queen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable except for straps
customer_reviews.text: I like the material and overall construction, but the fact that straps don't adjust is not a good idea. I found them too short for me. I already discarded the bag, so I can't return.
customer_reviews.author: gardenvet

customer_reviews.title: Totally Unacceptable
customer_reviews.text: There's no way to adjust the straps! All else "very" good! Didn't return bc fit so comfortable will put few stitches for permanent adjust. Hope will make to adjust straps
customer_reviews.author: Jesus is Lord

customer_reviews.title: Loveee
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little small, if your in between sizes too up a cup size and if you want room in the band go up an inch. So comfortable, love how it fits. I wish I bought no underwire bras sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Straps are not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: This bra is OK. It fits but the straps can not be adjusted, which I didn’t realize when I ordered. So, occasionally the bra rides up which is kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: My best bra!
customer_reviews.text: Second one i purchase and its excellent! The non wired bra of Warner from this model are perfect. I have several colors. The first one bought at macys and since then im buying them again and again . Its an excellent bra,especially for small size . Keeps well my breast ,both comfort and feeling is great.I use it with tshirts or more elegant shirts,in fact its my most used bra!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is great, shape is great BUT NO ADJUSTABLE STRAPS
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviewers that said the straps adjust, they DO NOT. Unfortunately this is a great shape bra, soft material, but straps HAVE to adjust. One strap does not fit all and since the straps have some give to them, I am not interested in "flopping" around. TOO BAD. Going back
customer_reviews.author: PHAC

customer_reviews.title: For a bra I bought without trying on, it was okay
customer_reviews.text: This bra is okay - I wouldn't want to wear it for 20 hours or anything like that, as it does get uncomfortable at the end of the day. It washes out fine and I don't put it in the dryer. It looks smooth under clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable Bra
customer_reviews.text: My daughter told me about this bra and said it’s the most comfortable bra she owns. She was right!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and flattering!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a “B” and want to look like a “”C,” this bra is ideal. Without the wires it is comfortable, and with the lift it is flattering. By now, I have tried a billion bras, and Warner makes the best. They are durable also, wash after wash.
customer_reviews.author: Minniemouse

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for the money. I have bought some in almost every color offered!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great for small busts
customer_reviews.text: The perfect bra for a small bust! I’m a 34A and this is just a great fit and super comfortable. No gaps in the cups. They lay nicely and don’t show any seams under shirts. Although the straps aren’t adjustable, they are the right size for my 5’2 frame. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Why isn' this the same fit as the other Warner's Wirefree bras?
customer_reviews.text: I bought and returned this item immediately. I wear Warner's wirefree bras all the time and assumed this would have the same fit. But, definitely not! Too large (I take a 36 A in all of their bras) and straps were not adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: ronni wadler

customer_reviews.title: Not Cotton, and incredibly itchy and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this is falsely advertised. It's made from an itchy, synthetic material. Also, it's very uncomfortable. The hooks dig in your back, the strap seems to have stiff edges that dig into your skin. By the end of the day, you want to rip this thing off. I'm returning it. It
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfortable. Will buy more in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: easytarget

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bra - But No Adjustable Straps
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy I found this bra. When I first put it on I really liked it. It fit nicely, the fabric was soft. Unfortunately, it was riding up a tad in the back and adjustable shoulder straps would have fixed this problem - but there aren't any. I should have noticed before purchasing. I ended up returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: gideon vandegrift

customer_reviews.title: Best Bra Ever
customer_reviews.text: I think bras should be uncomplicated --- who needs all the hardware they put in them nowadays?? The only hardware on this one is the clasp on the back. I will not wear anything else. Always a good fit, always comfortable, smooth under clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Moon

customer_reviews.title: Soft, terrible fit
customer_reviews.text: Cup size is inaccurate and runs larger than listed. Same with band. Straps are not adjustable and stretch too easily. Material is soft and comfortable but there is absolutely no support, no lift, and a lot of gapping in front due to cup size running larger than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Mican

customer_reviews.title: Straps aren't adjustable :(
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bra, pretty and would be comfortable if I could adjust the straps. Some review said the straps weren't adjustable but another person said they were. They are definitely not. I'm tall, so as soon as I raise my arms the girls are going to pop out. Not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable... Just one of the best bras I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Straps are not adjustable length.
customer_reviews.text: The shoulder straps are not adjustable. So if you always have your bra straps adjusted to the shortest length, this may work for you, but if you usually adjust the straps longer, then this is not for you! I returned it. It seemed otherwise fine.
customer_reviews.author: Natureheart

customer_reviews.title: Love these bras!
customer_reviews.text: As a member of the itty bitty titty community, Warner is continuing to be my favorite brand. This style was super cute and gave me shape without feeling like I’m all bra. Comfortable and doesn’t warp in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Really Love This Bra
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd color of this bra I have purchased. Very comfortable, good coverage and no unsightly bumps from adjustment buckles or back fastener under knit tops. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: HunterJ

customer_reviews.title: Like Bra
customer_reviews.text: I really like the bra only I wish it would have adjustable straps. You may want to consider changing.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Morel

customer_reviews.title: Most uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bra looks great, but it is the most uncomfortable bra I ever had. It doesn't "breathe," so it's always too warm. It sticks to every shirt it's under. Perhaps it would make a good swimsuit top. I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: LLS

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I stopped wearing a lot of under wire bras a few years back when I read about the long term effects of these bras on breast tissue. I have always looked new wireless bras that have cute patterns and they are hard to find as the world loves wire bras. This bra fit great and is really cute, I highly recommend it and it also gives you a little boost
customer_reviews.author: judy cazares

customer_reviews.title: Straps too short.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, comfortable material. Unfortunately the straps are not adjustable and too short which causes the bra to ride up. Should have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: ArnoldP

customer_reviews.title: Feels So Comfy and Supports
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the most comfortable bras I've ever worm. Supports and gives me a nice, rounded appearance instead of party hats. Cups needs to be cut fuller, though. I'm not the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Virtual Erin

customer_reviews.title: Cups run large for the size
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to the mostly cotton construction of this bra. VERY disappointed that the cups were too big for this size and that straps are not adjustable. I am sure it will work for some, but not me! I am unfortunately returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing for "side boob"
customer_reviews.text: This bra is comfortable until you start moving around. The sides under your arm just crumple and fold over because there is nothing there to stop it from wadding up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, no adjustable straps
customer_reviews.text: Luckily they fit well and are comfy, but if you need adjustable straps, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M Duero

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure What It Is
customer_reviews.text: Usually Asian sourced clothes are petite and sized for smaller framed women and bone structures. But these bras don't look or fit as shown. The cup size was more a D than C and sloppy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Overwatch

customer_reviews.title: This bra fit very well and is comfortable, without the irritation of any elastic band
customer_reviews.text: This bra fit very well and is comfortable, without the irritation of any elastic band. I’ve developed an skin allergic reaction to anything elastic directly against my skin because it is latex, so this bra design works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Jacey

customer_reviews.title: Weird shape & way too small
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed in these because I LOVE the others from Warner's that I ordered. The shape they give you is really weird and it fits WAY too small. I would return but I took the tags off before trying them on.
customer_reviews.author: tex3310

customer_reviews.title: Its nice
customer_reviews.text: Its comfortable, it fit perfect. It would be a little better if it had a wire just because after wearing it for a while i feel like its going to end up sagging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Larger Size Still Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I returned the bra that was my normal size (all the other bras I wear are the size I first ordered) and when it was too tight, I returned it for a size larger, just to give it another chance. Not only is it still tight, there is also stitching on the back that rubbed my back all day long and was very painful. This bra had to have been designed by a man!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Burton

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the most comfortable bra I’ve ever worn. Heads up that you can’t adjust the straps- they fit me perfectly though. This is my go-to everyday bra.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This was laughably ugly on me
customer_reviews.text: ok. so I just needed this to be my final reminder that yes, I need an underwire, period. I'm a 32DDD or 34DD, and this was just not enough support, and fit so strangely. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Value
customer_reviews.text: It fits as expected and is a good price especially for a Warner's bra. It was nearly twice this price at the department store.
customer_reviews.author: Ragz2Zigzags

customer_reviews.title: Comfort with support!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bra!!! I have fibromyalgia and the wires in bras irritate and bruise me, but this fits amazing and comfortably while still offering support!!! Will be ordering more!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Zickefoose

customer_reviews.title: Too pointy
customer_reviews.text: If you want to look like you literally have cones hanging from your chest, this is the bra for you. It is comfortable, that is all it has going for it.
customer_reviews.author: Sid Bids' Mom

customer_reviews.title: Attractive design & style
customer_reviews.text: Like the pattern and V cut but it does not have adjustable straps .... as a result the back of the bra tends to ride up a bit. I measured exactly as directed but seems a bit snug on the band. I’m sure it’s likely to stretch some eventually. With the band tighter it does tend to push flesh to underarm area .... looking flabbier there ....not a problem with sleeves only tank tops.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah W

customer_reviews.title: The straps are not adjustable. That said it fits ...
customer_reviews.text: The straps are not adjustable. That said it fits ok now - but when it starts to stretch - you won't be able to tighten it up - shorteningg the life of the bra. We bought other versions of this brand of bra and those do have adjustable straps. This beige one doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: CBR

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd try a new style. It does as stated in the description I just don't care for it and the hooks/attachments scratch my back. Might just be this particular one though. That has happened to me before with other ones.
customer_reviews.author: ktby715

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable bra I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant buying a bra online but let me tell you, it is the most comfortable bra I have ever bought and will definitely be buying more in other colors soon ! One thing that I was surprised about when opening, was it doesn't have adjustable shoulder straps but when I tried it on they were the perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: justin malazzo

customer_reviews.title: Straps don't adjust
customer_reviews.text: I'm rather small chested and I love Warners "wire-free lift" bras (I hate underwires). My reason for deducting a star from this one is the straps don't adjust and are short enough that when I reach up the bra rides up.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Gera

customer_reviews.title: This bra is PERFECT. I am athletic with a wider back and ...
customer_reviews.text: This bra is PERFECT. I am athletic with a wider back and smallsmaller chest so often can't find the right fit. 36A was perfect and so comfortable. All Warners bras are comfy but this one is also cute and fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea coons

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable bra
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised how well this fit and was very comfortable, ended up ordering two more! Just wish it had adjustable straps
customer_reviews.author: MesaSam

customer_reviews.title: Had to refund because while I got the proper size ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to refund because while I got the proper size to fit front and back, my purchase wasn't adjustable to securely fit my arms properly because the pieces were missing from the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells of toxic chemicals
customer_reviews.text: There is a toxic floral spray on this that gave me a headache immediately. I believe it is formaldehyde which is a dangerous carcinogenic that causes shortness of breath, skin chest and eye irritation. Warners please stop spraying your clothes with deadly chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Moira McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I absolutely love this bra. I now have 3. Will be buying more, as they are now my "go to".
customer_reviews.author: Krista Preston

customer_reviews.title: Warner's Bra
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this product. It has too much padding and it doesn't have adjustable straps.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not cotton on inside, and straps are not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: When you want cotton, that means on the places that touch the skin! This is not that. The cups are lined with some petro-chemical synthetic fabric that is not even listed on the materials used.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

product_meta.title: Warner's Invisible Bliss Cotton Wirefree with Lift Bra
product_meta.description: Easy size makes it a snap to find the right fit. All-over stretch fabric accommodates your unique shape
feature_bullets: All-over stretch fabric accommodate your unique shape
Inner panel provides for side support
